description:
aura: Remove browser/ui/views/aura/ paths from build.

% find chrome/browser/ui/views/aura
find: `chrome/browser/ui/views/aura': No such file or directory

BUG=none
TEST=successfully built with use_aura=1

Committed: http://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=104824

messages.text:
LGTM

On Mon, Oct 10, 2011 at 3:50 PM, <derat@chromium.org> wrote:

> Reviewers: Ben Goodger (Google),
>
> Description:
> aura: Remove browser/ui/views/aura/ paths from build.
>
> % find chrome/browser/ui/views/aura
> find: `chrome/browser/ui/views/aura'**: No such file or directory
>
> BUG=none
> TEST=successfully built with use_aura=1
>
>
> Please review this at http://codereview.chromium.**org/8220018/<http://codereview.chromium.org/8220018/>
>
> SVN Base: svn://svn.chromium.org/chrome/**trunk/src<http://svn.chromium.org/chrome/trunk/src>
>
> Affected files:
>  M chrome/chrome_browser.gypi
>
>
> Index: chrome/chrome_browser.gypi
> diff --git a/chrome/chrome_browser.gypi b/chrome/chrome_browser.gypi
> index ea82d69a6ef51802fb514f4d27a5b8**5eb770a53f..**
> 819dde6a145c4b40bcd1d1e7f72d5f**430496dc77 100644
> --- a/chrome/chrome_browser.gypi
> +++ b/chrome/chrome_browser.gypi
> @@ -4072,11 +4072,6 @@
>             ],
>           },
>         }],
> -        ['use_aura==0', {
> -          'sources/': [
> -            ['exclude', '^browser/ui/views/aura/*'],
> -          ],
> -        }],
>         ['use_aura==1', {
>           'sources/': [
>             ['exclude', '^browser/aeropeek_manager.cc'**],
> @@ -5002,7 +4997,6 @@
>             ['exclude', '^browser/ui/input_window_**dialog.h'],
>             ['exclude', '^browser/ui/input_window_**dialog_win.cc'],
>             ['include', '^browser/ui/login/login_**prompt_ui.cc'],
> -            ['include', '^browser/ui/views/aura/aura_**init.cc'],
>             ['include', '^browser/ui/views/browser_**bubble_aura.cc'],
>             ['include', '^browser/ui/views/**constrained_html_delegate_**
> views.cc'],
>             ['include', '^browser/ui/views/dropdown_**bar_host_aura.cc'],
>
>
>

subject: aura: Remove browser/ui/views/aura/ paths from build.
